title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 80.6 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 80.6 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations

The Department of Civil Service shall accept requests for
public access to records and produce records for public inspection as
follows: (a) At the State Campus in

Albany on any workday between the hours of 8:30 and 4:45, (b) At the Buffalo office on any workday
between the hours of 9 and 4 and
(c) At the New York City office on any
workday between the hours of 10 and 3. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
80.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
